TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(object sender, WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs)
public delegate void WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs ^ e);
type WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler = delegate of obj * WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 的 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是为类的事件定义的 。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 可以 通过在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中指定名为 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 的子程序来访问类的事件。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 事件 在事件期间引发 。The event is raised during the event. 使用 IIS 提供的 Windows 标识构造对象， 并将其传递给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 您可以使用 提供给 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的对象的属性，将 当前的属性设置 为自定义 对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未在 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件期间为属性指定值，则 IIS 提供的 Windows 标识将用作当前请求的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则 对象的属性将 设置为该方法返回的标识 。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property of the object is set to the identity returned by the method. 仅**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**当身份验证 设置为 ，并且 是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块时，才引发 WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件。The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件将 当前的属性设置 为自定义 对象。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
